column4: I had a samba share sharing a folder across my network. it stopped working after i networked my printer. now my printer works over the network, but no more folder share. any help will be greatly appreciated.
is it possible that you changed the workgroup in /etc/samba/smb.conf?
nope workgroup has stayed the same.
i set up the share by right clicking on the folder and doing sharing options though... where is the config file for that?
im not sure, it looks like they are all handled by the package nautilus-share
ok i'll look into that and see if there are any config files that may have been altered
looks like they are added to samba @ /var/lib/samba/usershares
yep they are there. wonder why they don't show on the network...
dont know, can you access them from there?
what do you mean?
can you view the contents from within those folders?
yes. the weird thing is, print$ doesn't even show up on the network... it is like my system has vanished, yet i can still use the print share?
have you restarted since this all has started happening?
yes. it stopped working a few weeks ago when i networked my printer
i've just been putting my videos on a jump drive, but i'm tired of that and want my share back :)
unfortunately im not too sure why thats happening to you
darn :( well thanks for the help anyway :)
np, if i think of something else ill let you know
ok thanks. if i find the solution i'll be sure to let you know
my system shows up on network now, but when i open it, there are no items in there. not even $print
are you on 9.04, i have a similiar issue i believe on my laptop
yes 9.04
did it work at one time on your laptop?
